targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(irate(apiserver_request_duration_seconds_bucket{component="apiserver", scope="namespace", verb=~"LIST|GET", subresource!~"log|exec|portforward|attach|proxy"}[$interval])) by (le, resource, verb)) > 0

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(irate(apiserver_request_duration_seconds_bucket{component="apiserver", scope="cluster", verb=~"LIST|GET", subresource!~"log|exec|portforward|attach|proxy"}[$interval])) by (le, resource, verb)) > 0
